note: The pipeline has some randomness component, for example, read mapping step may not be determinstic: Bowtie2, if used, assigns mapping location of a read randomly if mapping score are the same.

The pipeline has some randomness component, for example, read mapping step may not be determinstic: Bowtie2, if used, assigns mapping location of a read randomly if mapping score are the same. If mapping-free methods are used, the expectation maximization step can have random component during optimization as well.

The pipeline has some randomness component, for example, read mapping step may not be determinstic: Bowtie2, if used, assigns mapping location of a read randomly if mapping score are the same. If mapping-free methods are used, the expectation maximization step can have random component during optimization as well. Also, the dimension reduction method t-SNE, if used, is not determinstic.

The pipeline has some randomness component, for example, read mapping step may not be determinstic: Bowtie2, if used, assigns mapping location of a read randomly if mapping score are the same. In another major step of peak calling, statistics result of peak significance can be different due to sampling processes.
